title: At her UJ visit Meghan Markle says education is key in women empowerment
text:
The Duchess and Duke of Sussex's royal tour is drawing to a close, and Meghan spent her last day apart from her husband promoting the role of education in gender equality.

The Duchess of Sussex brought a message of women's empowerment to the University of Johannesburg on 1 October. She and Prince Harry have just one day left of their royal tour of Africa. And, she's using her time to promote the importance of education to foster gender equality.

"When a woman is empowered it changes absolutely everything in the community and starting an educational atmosphere is really a key point in that," says the duchess.

Meghan announced three new gender grants to support women in higher education and research roles.



Watch the video for more.
